name: New York Bikes - Prediction
shortDescription: Predict availability of bikes in New York
longDescription: In this sample, you'll see how to predict near-future bikes availability in New York based on current bikes and weather forecasts

Variables.Name: bike_input
Variables.Description: This is the input topic for bike data

Variables.Name: weather_input
Variables.Description: This is the input topic for weather data

Variables.Name: output
Variables.Description: Name of the output topic to write predictions to
